Plot: A young Japanese man works to raise money and then build an elementary school in Cambodia.
Title: We Can't Change the World. But, We Wanna Build a School in Cambodia.
Writer: Kôta Hada (based on the book by), Shinsuke Yamaoka (screenplay)
Actors: Osamu Mukai, Tôri Matsuzaka, Tasuku Emoto, Masataka Kubota
